title: Internship
description: I secured my first unpaid internship at  Co. Ltd, where I worked as a full-stack web developer. During this time, I successfully completed four projects utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and C#.

title: Assitant Web Developmer
description: After I completed my internship I had to go back to my studies. Therefore, my full-time Job as a Junior Developer was abit late.But I luckily gained my fist Job at KBZ bank software team, soon I was promoted to mid-level Develper where I exprtised in ReactJS and NextJS

title: Full Stack Web Developer
description: Initially, I started my journey as a Junior Web Developer at Myanmar ICT Solutions Co. Ltd. Through dedication and hard work, I was later promoted to the position of Mid-Level Developer. During my tenure, I made significant contributions to eight projects, utilizing technologies such as Laravel, CodeIgniter, React, jQuery, and others.

title: Senior PHP Developer
description: Recently, I transitioned to MySol Co. Ltd, a Japan-based company, where I assumed the role of Senior PHP Developer. However, amidst political changes, I found it necessary to contemplate pursuing my career path in another country.
